title: Merging icons creates duplicates
content:
I'm trying to organize my Pixel 3A home screen.
So I'm meging all my photography icons. But when I move, say, Instragam, I wind up with 2 icons, one merged plus the original unmerged. 
How do I get rid of the original icon while keeping the merged icon?

Along that line, I tried to find out how to delete an icon and found that I must 'right click it'.  However I couldnt find out how to do a 'right click on an icon'.  Please help.
J
